metadata.title: CVE-2018-5816 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow error within the "identify()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.12 can beexploited to trigger a division by zero via specially crafted NOKIARAW file(Note: This vulnerability is caused due to an incomplete fix ofCVE-2018-5804).

criterions.comment: darktable package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
